author: EmyrClement
body:
#### PR description:

Updating Herwig7 MPI settings for Herwig7.2

- Rename of AlphaMZ to AlphaIn
- Remove redundant/obsolete settings in tune configs
- Added additional settings block that replicate the MPI model of Herwig7.1 in Herwig7.2, which is required for using the CH tunes.

#### PR validation:

Tested by generating MB events locally with these settings.  Validation and details of the changes were presented at the [GEN meeting on 25th May 2020](https://indico.cern.ch/event/916119/#3-ch3-with-herwig-72)
title: Herwig7p2 mpi settings
